document.full_text: three children were injured at lunchtime on tuesday at a houston elementary school when a gun fell out of a 6-year-old's pocket and went off in the cafeteria, houston independent school district officials said.
document.title: 6-year-old has gun in school, three children hurt
lines_and_colors: three children were injured at lunchtime on tuesday at a houston elementary school when a gun fell out of a 6-year-old's pocket and went off in the cafeteria, houston independent school district officials said.
